name: Talk To Me personality test
description: Talk To Me personality test, should be a kind of quiz game. The game should look like man is playing on an old computer or TV, man answers questions that are asked to you by a computer-like assistant, and the game should be gloomy and scary, the game should look realistic. Every question you choose changes the story. Try the game yourself and get tested. Note: this game is a test a shorty demo not the full game. I will bring out a full version so soon as I can
